item.title: Resmetirom Reduces Liver Stiffness in MASH Cirrhosis
item.description: Treatment with resmetirom produced sustained reductions in liver stiffness and portal hypertension. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Who’s Prescribing Now? The Quiet NHS Revolution
item.description: The UK’s growing army of non-medical prescribers — from pharmacists to paramedics — is reshaping how patients access medicines. Medscape News UK
